meta.title: 2022 Best National Universities p 28 | US News Rankings
meta.description: Compare the top national universities in the U.S. Learn more about the best national universities to find the right school for you.
meta.og:title: The Best National Universities in America
meta.og:description: See how the top national universities rank at US News. Find rankings for the best national universities in the US.

toggle.heading: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

hero.title: Best National University Rankings
hero.description: Schools in the National Universities category, such as the University of Chicago and Carnegie Mellon University, offer a full range of undergraduate majors, plus master's and doctoral programs. These colleges also are committed to producing groundbreaking research.
hero.subtitle: Here are the best colleges in the U.S.

items.blurb: Students at University of Alabama—Huntsville can choose from more than 60 academic majors. UAHuntsville history majors with good academic merit may be eligible for a scholarship established by alumnus John Hendricks, founder and chair of Discovery Communications.
Founded in 1882, University of Findlay is a private institution. The school has 64.7% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at University of Findlay is 16:1.

Founded in 1908, University of Nebraska--Omaha is a public institution. University of Nebraska--Omaha offers a Greek system, where 2 percent of the student body is involved in a sorority and 2% is involved in a fraternity.

Located in Jacksonville, the University of North Florida offers many opportunities for students to explore campus media via a website, magazine, TV station and radio station. The UNF Ospreys intercollegiate teams are cheered on by Ozzie Osprey, their feathered mascot.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1881, University of the Incarnate Word is a private institution. The school has 61.9% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at University of the Incarnate Word is 12:1.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Located in Kalamazoo, Western Michigan University offers more than 300 student organizations, nearly 30 fraternities and sororities and many Division I sports. Off campus, WMU students can check out Kalamazoo’s zoo, theater and festivals, or drive 40 minutes to the Lake Michigan beaches of South Haven.

satAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1887, Campbell University is a private institution. Campbell University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

actAvg.noteText: SAT and/or ACT not required by school for some or all applicants.

items.blurb: Founded in 1881, Concordia University Wisconsin is a private institution. The school has 57.1% of its classes with fewer than 20 students, and the student-faculty ratio at Concordia University Wisconsin is 11:1.
Founded in 1961, Florida Atlantic University is a public institution.

institution.footnote: This school declined to fill out the U.S. News & World Report main statistical survey. Data that appears is from either what the school reported in previous years or from another source, such as the National Center for Education Statistics.

acceptanceRate.noteText: Data reported to U.S. News in previous years

satAvg.noteText: Previous year's data was used in the ranking calculation.

actAvg.noteText: Previous year's data was used in the ranking calculation.

items.blurb: Founded in 1905, Gardner-Webb University is a private institution. Gardner-Webb University follows a semester-based academic calendar and its admissions are considered selective.

utag_data.stitial_fact: During the fall 2015 admission cycle, 79 percent of international graduate applications came from Chinese and Indian nationals.
